=head2 Miscellaneous

=head3 Prefers 24 hour time?

No

=head3 Local first day of the week

7 (ऐतबार)

=head2 Strftime Patterns

=head3 %c (%A %d %b %Y %I:%M:%S %p) - date time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = मंगलबार 05 फर. 2008 06:30:30 स’ञ
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = शुक्रबार 22 दिस. 1995 09:05:02 सवेर
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = शनिबार 15 सित. -10 04:44:23 सवेर

=head3 %x (%-d/%-m/%y) - date format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = %-d/%-m/08
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = %-d/%-m/95
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = %-d/%-m/10

=head3 %X (%I:%M:%S %p %Z) - time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 06:30:30 स’ञ UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02 सवेर UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23 सवेर UTC

=head1 SUPPORT

See L<DateTime::Locale>.

=cut
